data.actual_result: The status doesn't update at all
data.expected_result: The song information should be displayed along with currently listening to Spotify
data.short_description: Spotify status doesn't update with long song titles
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect Spotify to your account - Play a song with a long title, I used Camellia's song on the album "1000 OVER!!" - Check your status
